title: Tennis-Bookmaker's odds ahead of the French Open
text:
May 25, 2018 / 6:04 PM / Updated 30 minutes ago Bookmaker's odds ahead of the French Open Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - The following is a list of bookmaker William Hill’s odds ahead of the French Open:
Men’s winner: 2/5 Nadal, 8/1 Alexander Zverev, 10/1 Dominic Thiem, 10/1 Novak Djokovic, 40/1 David Goffin, 40/1 Juan Martin del Potro, 40/1 Kei Nishikori, 40/1 Marin Cilic, 50/1 Stan Wawrinka, 50/1 Grigor Dimitrov, 66/1 Nick Kyrgios, 66/1 Kyle Edmund.
Women’s winner: 6/1 Simona Halep, 6/1 Elina Svitolina, 11/1 Maria Sharapova, 12/1 Serena Williams, 14/1 Garbine Muguruza, 14/1 Jelena Ostapenko, 14/1 Petra Kvitova, 16/1 Karolina Pliskova, 20/1 Daria Kastkina, 20/1 Kiki Bertens, 25/1 Caroline Wozniacki, 25/1 Caroline Garcia, 28/1 Angelique Kerber, 40/1 Victoria Azarenka, 66/1 Johanna Konta, 80/1 Venus Williams.
* Betting odds provided by William Hill Compiled by Shrivathsa Sridhar in Bengaluru
